name: Cup O' Grainfruit
effect:
Restores 8–10% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 210–300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: A snack made from Grainfruit. The kernels are broken off, then steamed together with Embercore Flower nectar. Each and every one of them ends up being juicy, fragrant, and irresistibly sweet.

suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: A snack made from Grainfruit. The overheating has caused most of the moisture to evaporate away. Only the dried, utterly unappetizing kernels remain.

normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: A snack made from Grainfruit. The kernels are broken off, then steamed together with Embercore Flower nectar. Each and every one of them ends up being juicy, fragrant, and irresistibly sweet.

delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: A snack made from Grainfruit. The fresh, plump kernels explode on the tip of your tongue, like a lively party that leaves a lingering sweet aftertaste.
